title: enna tAn inbam kaNDAyO
sahitya:
enna tAn inbam kaNDAyO iNaiyil ezhil kANa vizhaiyum 
ennilum mighavum adhikamO atishayamO kuzhailshaiyil


anupallavi

  punnakaiyADum pullenra kuzhalUdum punitanE engaL puNNiyanE 
munnazhagaik-kaNDAl mOhamighum enru sholli pinnazhagai aruLum pemmAnE


caraNam    alaiyalaiyAi sharindu kuzhal ADavE kATril aNiyaNiyAi parandu iDai mUDavE talaiyaNIk-
kambaLam bhuyam kUDavE adaik-kaNDu darishittapOdu endan nANam parandODavE
